snippet: Americans lagged behind Japan and Finland in math and technical skills needed for a modern workplace.
abstract: Study by Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development shows that American adults lag well behind their counterparts in most other developed countries in mathematical and technical skills needed for modern workplace.
lead_paragraph: Americans lagged behind Japan and Finland in math and technical skills needed for a modern workplace.

headline.main: U.S. Adults Fare Poorly in a Study of Skills
headline.print_headline: U.S. Adults Fare Poorly In a Study Of Skills

keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
keywords.name: organizations
